sentences.sContent: Open any of the layout templates, insert your text, make any other changes, and print.
sentences.sCn: 打开任何一个设计模板，插入你的文本，做任何其他改动，然后打印。

phrases.pCn: 模板实参；范本自变量；模板参数

trans.tranOther: a thin sheet of plastic or metal in a special shape or pattern, used to help cut other materials in a similar shape
